name: Phobetor
description:
GAME LANGUAGE: ENGLISH

Our player wakes up on a train with no memory of how they got there or where they are going. Next to them, they find a ticket with a destination in a strange language.

As they move through the train, trying to find what the destination means, they notice this is not a normal environment for the further they go, the more this journey turns into a feverish nightmare...

Art

Franka Ordemen

Iris van der Jagt

Maaike Smidt

Game Design + Graphic (Motion) Design
